pr_title: HIVE-23963: UnsupportedOperationException in queries 74 and 84 while applying HiveCardinalityPreservingJoinRule

timeline.bodyText: nit. Can we add the mapping to a map and do the lookup, instead of having a nested loop?
timeline.author: jcamachor

timeline.message: HIVE-23963: UnsupportedOperationException in queries 74 and 84 while applying HiveCardinalityPreservingJoinRule - address review comment

timeline.bodyText: If it is meant to be fixed in Calcite then we should create a JIRA and add an entry in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer.calcite.Bug. We could even skip the JIRA creation and move this comment in Bug as CALCITE-X0000_fixed or something similar.
timeline.author: zabetak

replies.bodyText: @kasakrisz , please create the Calcite JIRA so it is easier to track. Thanks
replies.author: jcamachor
